summary: {FIC} - whatever you’ve done, just bury it boku no hero academia | izuku x katsuki future fic | a/b/o | featuring pro hero deku...
body:
{FIC} - whatever you’ve done, just bury it

boku no hero academia | izuku x katsuki

future fic | a/b/o | featuring pro hero deku & vigilante katsuki

rating: e (explicit sexual content)
chapters: 2/3 | updated 1 / 2 / 2019 | 7,515 words
summary/excerpt:

    He knows how Katsuki thinks, talks, and fights. He knows how he sleeps, how he eats, how he loves, and how he leaves. And he knows what knows what it means when Katsuki decides to come back; has washed the evidence from the sheets countless times, scrubbed the scent of him off his skin in the morning until it’s as red and raw as his heart.
    Katsuki shoves his hands into the pockets of his joggers and tilts his chin up, eyes narrowed like he’s looking for a fight. “I’m here to share some important villain intel with the Number One Hero. So,invite me to stay for dinner.”

//

A fic where neither Katsuki nor Izuku know how to let go, so they just keep holding on.

yo! im maya, your resident Shouji Stan and all around mutant lover! bnha is the bagel to my cream cheese (and lox) and i mainly post about that here!

summary: Amajiki Tamaki!!! I'm actually very curious to know your thoughts and hc's on him.
question: Amajiki Tamaki!!! I'm actually very curious to know your thoughts and hc's on him.
answer:
(Just a reminder I’m not taking HC asks for the time being, I’m just clearing up my inbox of the last ones!)

And this is the last HC ask in my askbox! Phew! We finally got here! haha! Also let me just say that while I love Tamaki, I never really focused that much on his character. So I went back and reread the wiki and some of the manga and as someone so far up on the HADS that they can barely function….big mood. 


-He’s a bit of a shoujo manga enthusiast. Especially romcoms or ones where the heroine has to overcome a huge obstacle in her way. Most of his downtime can find him with one of his favorite volumes curled up in a corner to read. 

-He has so many soft tactiles in his room that being in there is like being on a cloud. His blankets are super soft, his pillows, his clothing, his carpet. Anything he touches is on the regular is bound to be soft. Very few of his items are hard and are mostly used to keep his hands busy. 

-Fidget toys are his best friend at times. 

-Stuffed animals also tend to be his forte. Not that he actively goes to get them but his friends and family send him them often and so he’s got a bunch that all have names. 

-While he doesn’t label himself out of the binary of the gender spectrum, he doesn’t really see much of the boundaries when he’s with his friends, family, or alone. He’ll enjoy stuff just because he enjoys it, not caring if it’s “meant for women”. Sometimes he struggles with showing any of this in public so it’s mostly a secret. 

-Stained glass is a hobby of his. Loving to fill his windows with the colorful decorations and waking up to a room covered in rainbows during the sunrise. 

-He has a decent surplus of talents that lay hidden. Often picking up a new hobby or something to keep his hands/mind busy when he needs it. He’s rather good at anything that can be done with idle hands. 

-Not good with vocal words but give him paper/pen or a computer and he will spin you a beautiful tale in form of written words. Mirio and Nejire absolutely love his poetry and reference him as their favorite author. 

-Mirio’s terrible humor always gets him snickering/giggling. He tries to hide it the best he can but his friends saw it once and that was the end of that. He laughs openly when no one is looking. 

-Mild OCD. Constantly having to do somethings over and over again until he’s satisfied with the result. Even mundane things. Sometimes he enters a room too loudly and excuses himself to do it again. He repeats words a few times under his breath until he thinks he has the tone right and says it again louder. Fatgum will at times meet him outside the agency to walk and talk with him when he struggles to make it on time. He’s doing great all things considered and can be the hero he needs to be with it. 
–His entire class knows about this and is more than accommodating and will wait for his signal to see if he needs help to overcome his urges. If he manages to stop on his own during a bad episode he will be utterly bombarded with support. 
—He used to have food aversion as a child because of this but managed to overcome it (with few regressions) with help from Mirio.

-White is his favorite color but he feels it’s too bold of a color for him to wear regularly off-duty so he wears darker colors instead. 

-He is one of the best supportive friends you could have at times. If you’re scared or nervous he’s one of the people you can go to to be thoroughly reassured. Sure, sometimes he struggles to agree with you about himself but he will go to great lengths to remind you that you’re amazing and can do anything if you put your mind to it. 

-He can finish a sudoku in record time. 

-Sometimes when he crashes for the night, he misses his bed and just lays on the floor. Luckily his carpet is extra soft. 

-He draws on his arms and hands. Not anything particularly astounding in terms of art but he’ll have tiny stars, comets, planets, the works on them throughout the day. It’s not odd to see him roll up his sleeves and reveal a tiny makeshift galaxy underneath. Occasionally he sneaks a sun onto Mirio’s arm when his friend isn’t paying attention.
–Mirio will argue tooth and nail with anyone who tells him he should wash it off. Saying it’s important to him. 

-He’s learning to play the piano because he finds the music very calming. He only knows “Neko Funjatta” by heart right now but he’s working on it. 

-He’s one of those people that greets animals like people and talks to them as such. If he passes by a stray cat he will bow his head in greeting and wishes them a good day. Animals find him rather relaxing to be around and will curl up beside him at times. It’s not odd to leave him alone for 5 minutes and come back to him surrounded by three cats and a bird.

reblog.comment:

-Stained glass is a hobby of his. Loving to fill his windows with the colorful decorations and waking up to a room covered in rainbows during the sunrise. 

-He has a decent surplus of talents that lay hidden. Often picking up a new hobby or something to keep his hands/mind busy when he needs it. He’s rather good at anything that can be done with idle hands. 

-Not good with vocal words but give him paper/pen or a computer and he will spin you a beautiful tale in form of written words. Mirio and Nejire absolutely love his poetry and reference him as their favorite author. 

-Mirio’s terrible humor always gets him snickering/giggling. He tries to hide it the best he can but his friends saw it once and that was the end of that. He laughs openly when no one is looking. 

-Mild OCD. Constantly having to do somethings over and over again until he’s satisfied with the result. Even mundane things. Sometimes he enters a room too loudly and excuses himself to do it again. He repeats words a few times under his breath until he thinks he has the tone right and says it again louder. Fatgum will at times meet him outside the agency to walk and talk with him when he struggles to make it on time. He’s doing great all things considered and can be the hero he needs to be with it. 
–His entire class knows about this and is more than accommodating and will wait for his signal to see if he needs help to overcome his urges. If he manages to stop on his own during a bad episode he will be utterly bombarded with support. 
—He used to have food aversion as a child because of this but managed to overcome it (with few regressions) with help from Mirio.

-White is his favorite color but he feels it’s too bold of a color for him to wear regularly off-duty so he wears darker colors instead. 

-He is one of the best supportive friends you could have at times. If you’re scared or nervous he’s one of the people you can go to to be thoroughly reassured. Sure, sometimes he struggles to agree with you about himself but he will go to great lengths to remind you that you’re amazing and can do anything if you put your mind to it. 

-He can finish a sudoku in record time. 

-Sometimes when he crashes for the night, he misses his bed and just lays on the floor. Luckily his carpet is extra soft. 

-He draws on his arms and hands. Not anything particularly astounding in terms of art but he’ll have tiny stars, comets, planets, the works on them throughout the day. It’s not odd to see him roll up his sleeves and reveal a tiny makeshift galaxy underneath. Occasionally he sneaks a sun onto Mirio’s arm when his friend isn’t paying attention.
–Mirio will argue tooth and nail with anyone who tells him he should wash it off. Saying it’s important to him. 

-He’s learning to play the piano because he finds the music very calming. He only knows “Neko Funjatta” by heart right now but he’s working on it. 

-He’s one of those people that greets animals like people and talks to them as such. If he passes by a stray cat he will bow his head in greeting and wishes them a good day. Animals find him rather relaxing to be around and will curl up beside him at times. It’s not odd to leave him alone for 5 minutes and come back to him surrounded by three cats and a bird.

summary:
Jirou: *drinks grape juice*
Mineta: Hey babe... what’re u drinking?
Jirou: The blood of my enemies.
Mineta: *backs away slowly...
body:
Jirou: *drinks grape juice*

Mineta: Hey babe… what’re u drinking?

Jirou: The blood of my enemies.

Mineta: *backs away slowly and terrified*

summary: I can't wait until season 4 of haikyuu! If I'm not wrong my hero academia is also blessing us with another season as well,...
question: I can't wait until season 4 of haikyuu! If I'm not wrong my hero academia is also blessing us with another season as well, right?
answer:
YES THEY ARE!

if im correct, they will both start airing in japan in the fall

i know that mha is supposed to air in october

im so excited! theres so many new anime seasons coming out this year
